item.title: 001 Inor10uk-Q2 Which of the following ions has the smallest radius ?

material.mattext: Kateri izmed navedenih ionov ima najmanjši radij?
Ca2+
Cr3+
Na+
Ag+
O22-
Ions contract with increasing positive charge.
Ions contract with increasing positive charge.
Ions contract with increasing positive charge.
Ions contract with increasing positive charge.

item.title: 002 Inor11uk-Q2 Which of the following statements are true for a triple

material.mattext: Katera od trditev, ki se nanašajo na trojno vez, je pravilna?
Je močnejša in daljša kot dvojna vez.
Je močnejša in krajša kot dvojna vez.
Je šibkejša in daljša kot dvojna vez.
Je šibkejša in krajša kot dvojna vez.
Je močnejša in krajša kot enojna vez.
Stronger bonds are shorter than corresponding weaker ones.Strength increases in the order: single, double, triple.

item.title: 003 Inor12uk-Q2 The molecule of BCl3, in it's equilibrium configuration

material.mattext:
Molekula BCl3 je planarna, koti med vezmi so 120°. Simetrijski elementi molekule so:

Legenda:
E = identiteta ; Cn = n-kratna os ; s = ravnina ;
Sn =  nepravilen vrstni red osi n ; h, v = horizontalno, vertikalno.
E , 2C3 , 3C2 , sh , 3sv , 2S3
E , 2C2 , 3C3 , sh , 3sv , 2S3
E , 3C2 , 3C3 , sh , 3sv , 2S3
E , 2C2 , 3C3 , 3sh , sv , 2S3
E , 2C2 , 3C3 , sh , 3sv , S3

item.title: 004 Inor13uk-Q2 The compound K2[OsCl5N] has the systematic

material.mattext: Spojina K2[OsCl5N] ima sistematično ime:
kalijev pentakloronitridoosmat (VIII)
kalijev pentakloronitridoosmat (VI)
kalijev amidopentakloroosmat (VI)
kalijev azidopentakloroosmat (VI)
kalijev klorohidrazidoosmat (V)
The ligands are 5 Cl- and a nitrido N3-.The metal oxidation state is in brackets after the anion.
The ligands are 5 Cl- and a nitrido N3-.The metal oxidation state is in brackets after the anion.
The ligands are 5 Cl- and a nitrido N3-.The metal oxidation state is in brackets after the anion.
The ligands are 5 Cl- and a nitrido N3-.The metal oxidation state is in brackets after the anion.
The ligands are 5 Cl- and a nitrido N3-.The metal oxidation state is in brackets after the anion.

item.title: 005 Inor14uk-Q2 Which of the following stereochemistries are possible

material.mattext: Katere od navedenih steričnih struktur so možne za kovinski kompleks s splošno formulo MX2Y2?
tetraedrična in kvadratna planarna
tetraedrična in oktaedrična
kvadratna planarna in oktaedrična
linearna in tetraedrična
trikotna planarna in tetraedrična

item.title: 006 Inor15uk-Q2 When hydrides of the alkali metals are treated

material.mattext: Ko hidridom alkalijskih kovin dodamo vodo, je eden izmed možnih končnih produktov:
H<SUB>2</SUB><SUP> </SUP>
H<SUP>-</SUP><SUB> </SUB>
H<SUP>+</SUP><SUB> </SUB>
O<SUB>2</SUB><SUP> </SUP>
Ne poteče reakcija<SUP> </SUP><SUB> </SUB>
Equilibrium between H-, H+ and H2 lies effectively towards H2.Any solvent such as water which gives a concentration of protons [solvated] will therefore give dihydrogen.
Equilibrium between H-, H+ and H2 lies effectively towards H2.Any solvent such as water which gives a concentration of protons [solvated] will therefore give dihydrogen.
Equilibrium between H-, H+ and H2 lies effectively towards H2.Any solvent such as water which gives a concentration of protons [solvated] will therefore give dihydrogen.
Equilibrium between H-, H+ and H2 lies effectively towards H2.Any solvent such as water which gives a concentration of protons [solvated] will therefore give dihydrogen.

item.title: 007 inor16uk-Q2 When PBr5 is treated with water, the products

material.mattext: Ko damo PBr5 v vodo, nastanejo naslednji produkti:
H3PO4 in HBr
H3PO3 in HBr
H3PO2 in HBr
H2P2O7 in HBr
P4O10 in Br2
No redox reactions occur, so H3PO3, H3PO2 and H2PO7 are wrong. P(V) oxide reacts with water.
No redox reactions occur, so H3PO3, H3PO2 and H2PO7 are wrong. P(V) oxide reacts with water.
No redox reactions occur, so H3PO3, H3PO2 and H2PO7 are wrong. P(V) oxide reacts with water.
No redox reactions occur, so H3PO3, H3PO2 and H2PO7 are wrong. P(V) oxide reacts with water.

item.title: 008 Inor17uk-Q2 Of the following statements about fluorine

material.mattext: Katera izmed naslednjih trditev o fluoru ni pravilna?
Povzroči znižanje oksidacijskega števila elementov, s katerimi zreagira.
Ima visoko elektronegativnost.
Tvori vrsto spojin z ostalimi halogenimi elementi.
Ima majhne atome.
Vez F-F ima nizko entalpijo.
Fluorine generally brings out the highest oxidation states in the elements it reacts with.
Fluorine generally brings out the highest oxidation states in the elements it reacts with.
Fluorine generally brings out the highest oxidation states in the elements it reacts with.
Fluorine generally brings out the highest oxidation states in the elements it reacts with.

item.title: 009 Inor18uk-Q2 Of the following pairs of transition metals, which has atoms

material.mattext: Atomi katerega para prehodnih elementov imajo približno enake kovinske radije?
Zr in Hf
Cr in Mo
Ni in Pd
Ti in Ca
Ta in Ir

2nd & 3rd row transition metals have approximately similar radii from a combination of the increase from the 4d to 5d shells and the intervening lanthanide contraction. Zr & Hf are particularly close.

2nd & 3rd row transition metals have approximately similar radii from a combination of the increase from the 4d to 5d shells and the intervening lanthanide contraction. Zr & Hf are particularly close.

2nd & 3rd row transition metals have approximately similar radii from a combination of the increase from the 4d to 5d shells and the intervening lanthanide contraction. Zr & Hf are particularly close.

2nd & 3rd row transition metals have approximately similar radii from a combination of the increase from the 4d to 5d shells and the intervening lanthanide contraction. Zr & Hf are particularly close.

item.title: 010 Inor19uk-Q2 How many unpaired electrons would you expect to find in the cation

material.mattext:
Koliko samskih elektronov je v kationu

[Co(NH3)6]2+?
Vtipkaj odgovor v spodnje okence:
The species is octahedral, d^7, with ligands exerting a small crystal field. The configuration will therefore be t_2g^5 . e_g#^2 ; giving 3 unpaired electrons (a high spin configuration).

item.title: 011 Inor1auk-Q2 For many ligand substitution reactions of octahedral complexes

material.mattext:
Ugotovili so, da je hitrost številnih reakcij zamenjave ligandov v oktaedričnem kompleksu le malo odvisna od vrste vstopajočih ligandov, in le malo variira pri opazovanih ligandih s podobnimi steričnimi a različnimi elektronskimi vplivi.

Iz tega sklepamo:
Stopnja, ki določa hitrost, je disociativna.
Stopnja, ki določa hitrost je asociativna.
Elektronski efekti niso pomembni za mehanizem reakcije.
Vsi oktaedrični kompleksi reagirajo z enako hitrostjo.
Hitrosti niso povezane z mehanizmi.

item.title: 012 Inor1buk-Q2 Which of the following is a correct statement about Lewis

material.mattext: Katera je pravilna trditev o Lewisovih kislinah in bazah?
Lewisova kislina je akceptor elektronskega para in Lewisova baza je donor elektronskega para.
Lewisova kislina je proton donor, Lewisova baza pa proton akceptor.
Lewisova kislina in Lewisova baza sprejemata elektronske pare.
Lewisova kislina in Lewisova baza oddajata protone.
Lewisova kislina je proton donor in elektron donor.
Lewis acids and bases are defined by electron pair acceptance and donation.
Lewis acids and bases are defined by electron pair acceptance and donation.
Lewis acids and bases are defined by electron pair acceptance and donation.
Lewis acids and bases are defined by electron pair acceptance and donation.

item.title: 013 Inor1cuk-Q2 Which of the following groups of organometallic compounds

material.mattext: Katera od naslednjih skupin organometalnih spojin ima primankljaj elektronov?
Alkili litijevih in berilijevih skupin.
Alkili bora in silicija.
Alkili prehodnih elementov.
Organske spojine živega srebra.
Tetraalkili Ti, Zr inHf.

Electron deficiency relates pairs of bonding electrons to pairs of directly bonded atoms. Thus electron poor compounds [e.g. Ti tetraalkyls, having fewer than 18 valence electrons] are not electron deficient.

Electron deficiency relates pairs of bonding electrons to pairs of directly bonded atoms. Thus electron poor compounds [e.g. Ti tetraalkyls, having fewer than 18 valence electrons] are not electron deficient.

Electron deficiency relates pairs of bonding electrons to pairs of directly bonded atoms. Thus electron poor compounds [e.g. Ti tetraalkyls, having fewer than 18 valence electrons] are not electron deficient.

Electron deficiency relates pairs of bonding electrons to pairs of directly bonded atoms. Thus electron poor compounds [e.g. Ti tetraalkyls, having fewer than 18 valence electrons] are not electron deficient.

item.title: 014 Inor1duk-Q2 The common orthorhombic form of elemental sulphur

material.mattext: Enostavno ortorombsko obliko elementarnega žvepla sestavljajo:
8-členski obroči v obliki krone
planarni 6-členski obroči
nagubani 5-členski obroči
tridimenzionalna mreža
prečno povezani polimeri

item.title: 015 Inor1euk-Q2 With which group of functions is iron associated

material.mattext: Katerimi funkcijami v bioloških sistemih je povezano železo?
Shranjevanje in transport kisika, redoks reakcije.
Tvorba kosti.
Proteinska sinteza in hidroliza.
Molekulske premestitvene reakcije.
Sinteza maščobnih kislin in vitaminov.
Iron is at the active site in myoglobin [O2 storage], haemoglobin [O2 transport] and in the electron transport chain.
Iron is at the active site in myoglobin [O2 storage], haemoglobin [O2 transport] and in the electron transport chain.
Iron is at the active site in myoglobin [O2 storage], haemoglobin [O2 transport] and in the electron transport chain.
Iron is at the active site in myoglobin [O2 storage], haemoglobin [O2 transport] and in the electron transport chain.

item.title: 016 Inor20uk-Q2 For some dioxygen species the O-O bond lengths

material.mattext:
Dolžine O-O vezi v nekaterih dikisikovih vrstah so:

112 pm ; 121 pm ; 126 pm ; 149 pm

Katero je pravilno zaporedje glede na zgoraj podane razdalje?
O2+ , O2 , O2- , O22-
O22- , O2- , O2 , O2+
O2 , O2- , O22- , O2+
O2+ , O22- , O2- , O2
O2- , O22- , O2+ , O2
The highest occupied molecular orbital is antibonding, so removal of an electron shortens the distance by strengthening the bond. All additions of electrons to O2 further lengthen the bond.
The highest occupied molecular orbital is antibonding, so removal of an electron shortens the distance by strengthening the bond. All additions of electrons to O2 further lengthen the bond.
The highest occupied molecular orbital is antibonding, so removal of an electron shortens the distance by strengthening the bond. All additions of electrons to O2 further lengthen the bond.
The highest occupied molecular orbital is antibonding, so removal of an electron shortens the distance by strengthening the bond. All additions of electrons to O2 further lengthen the bond.

item.title: 017 Inor24uk-Q2 How many isomeric species of all types

material.mattext:
Koliko izomer vseh vrst lahko zapišemo za oktaedrično kromovo spojino s formulo:

[Cr(hfacac)3(acac)n]

v kateri je "acac" ligand MeCOCHCOMe, in "hfacac" ligand CF3COCHCOCF3
4
5
6
7
8
Species exist for n = 0, 1, 2, and 3. Each species has an enantiomer.
Species exist for n = 0, 1, 2, and 3. Each species has an enantiomer.
Species exist for n = 0, 1, 2, and 3. Each species has an enantiomer.
Species exist for n = 0, 1, 2, and 3. Each species has an enantiomer.

item.title: 018 Inor25uk-Q2 The heats of dissociation of amine adducts of trimethyl

material.mattext:
Podane so toplote disociacije aminskih aduktov na trimetil bor [BMe3], za naslednje amine:

Me3N 73,6 ; Me2NH 80,7 ; MeNH2 73,6 ; NH3 57,5 kJ.mol-1

Kateri odgovor najbolje pojasni vzroke za te vrednosti?
Kombinacija steričnih in elektronskih efektov.
V glavnem sterični efekti.
V glavnem elektronski (induktivni) efekti.
Hibridizacijske spremembe na B.
Resonančni efekt.
Inductively more methyls strengthen the bond, but sterically they weaken it around the small B atom. The overall picture is a net result.
Inductively more methyls strengthen the bond, but sterically they weaken it around the small B atom. The overall picture is a net result.
Inductively more methyls strengthen the bond, but sterically they weaken it around the small B atom. The overall picture is a net result.
Inductively more methyls strengthen the bond, but sterically they weaken it around the small B atom. The overall picture is a net result.

item.title: 019 Inor26uk-Q2 In the 119Sn NMR spectrum, SnCl4 has a shift

material.mattext:
In the 119Sn NMR spectrum, SnCl4 has a shift of 150 ppm, and SnBr4 has a shift of 638 ppm, relative to tetramethyltin. When the two are mixed the NMR shows peaks at the following positions, with the intensities indicated in brackets:

150 (1) ; 265 (4) ; 387 (6) ; 509 (4) ; 635 (1)

The explanation is:
Statistical formation of exchanged species SnBrnCl4-n by redistribution.
Reaction with the solvent.
Partial hydrolysis due to impurities in the mixture.
Formation of complex cluster molecules.
Formation of donor-acceptor complexes between the species.
Redistribution of Cl & Br between the tin atoms. This is common for main group elements. The clue is intensities which follow the coefficients of the Pascal triangle {statistical weightings}.
Redistribution of Cl & Br between the tin atoms. This is common for main group elements. The clue is intensities which follow the coefficients of the Pascal triangle {statistical weightings}.
Redistribution of Cl & Br between the tin atoms. This is common for main group elements. The clue is intensities which follow the coefficients of the Pascal triangle {statistical weightings}.
Redistribution of Cl & Br between the tin atoms. This is common for main group elements. The clue is intensities which follow the coefficients of the Pascal triangle {statistical weightings}.

item.title: 020 Inor27uk-Q2 Which of the following statements about thionyl chloride

material.mattext: Katere izmed naslednjih trditev o tionil kloridu SOCl2 so pravilne:
Lahko ga pripravimo iz SO2 in PCl5.
Hidrolizira do HCl in SO2.
Je uporaben reagent za dehidriranje kovinskih soli.<SUB> </SUB>
Vez S-O ima značilnosti dvojne vezi.
Je oboje Lewisova kislina in Lewisova baza.<SUB> </SUB>
All statements are correct.

item.title: 021 Inor28uk-Q3 The structures of the species [Ni(CN)4]2-

material.mattext: Strukture [Ni(CN)4]2-, [NiCl4]2-, in [Ni(CO)4] so (po vrsti):
Kvadratna planarna, tetraedrična, tetraedrična.
Tetraedrična, kvadratna planarna, tetraedrična.
Tetraedrična, tetraedrična, kvadratna planarna.
Kvadratna planarna, oktaedrična, tetraedrična.
Tetraedrična, oktaedrična, kvadratna planarna.

The strong-field ligand, CN-, enforces square planar geometry on the d8 ion, which avoids occupancy of the highest energy metal orbital. The others are tetrahedral as expected. Octahedral describes 6-coordinate geometry.

The strong-field ligand, CN-, enforces square planar geometry on the d8 ion, which avoids occupancy of the highest energy metal orbital. The others are tetrahedral as expected. Octahedral describes 6-coordinate geometry.

The strong-field ligand, CN-, enforces square planar geometry on the d8 ion, which avoids occupancy of the highest energy metal orbital. The others are tetrahedral as expected. Octahedral describes 6-coordinate geometry.

The strong-field ligand, CN-, enforces square planar geometry on the d8 ion, which avoids occupancy of the highest energy metal orbital. The others are tetrahedral as expected. Octahedral describes 6-coordinate geometry.

item.title: 022 Inor29uk-Q1 Which of the following statements about the two complexes

material.mattext:
Katera od trditev, ki se nanaša na kobaltova kompleksa
[Co(en)(OH2)4]2+ (A) , in [Co(NH3)2(OH2)4]2+ (B) , je pravilna?

(en = H2NCH2CH2NH2)
A je bolj stabilen zaradi kelatnega efekta, ki je v osnovi entropičen.
B je bolj stabilen, ker so vezi z amoniakom močnejše kot z etilendiaminom.
Oba imata podobno stabilnost, ker je v obeh kompleksih vrsta vezi zelo podobna.
Ne moremo vedeti, ker je stabilnost odvisna od stereokemije kompleksov.
A je bolj stabilen, ker so enalpije vezi precej večje.

There is little difference between bond strengths (enthalpies), but the bidentate ligand binds with displacement of two monodentate ligands, contributing to increased entropy. Comparison of formation constants is complicated by dimensional difficulties, but the origin of the effect is genuinely entropic.

There is little difference between bond strengths (enthalpies), but the bidentate ligand binds with displacement of two monodentate ligands, contributing to increased entropy. Comparison of formation constants is complicated by dimensional difficulties, but the origin of the effect is genuinely entropic.

There is little difference between bond strengths (enthalpies), but the bidentate ligand binds with displacement of two monodentate ligands, contributing to increased entropy. Comparison of formation constants is complicated by dimensional difficulties, but the origin of the effect is genuinely entropic.

There is little difference between bond strengths (enthalpies), but the bidentate ligand binds with displacement of two monodentate ligands, contributing to increased entropy. Comparison of formation constants is complicated by dimensional difficulties, but the origin of the effect is genuinely entropic.

item.title: 023 Inor2auk-Q2 For the reaction: trans-[Co(LL)2Cl2]

material.mattext:
Pri reakciji:

trans-[Co(LL)2Cl2]+  +  H2O  →  [Co(LL)2(H2O)Cl]2+  +  Cl-

hitrost narašča po vrsti:

LL = H2N(CH2)2NH2 < H2NCH2CHMeNH2 < H2NCH2CMe2NH2 < H2N(CMe2)2NH2

Vzrok je:
Reakcija je disociativna in favorizirana z naraščajočim volumnom.
Reakcija je asociativna in favorizirana z metilnimi skupinami.
Metilne skupine destabilizirajo začetni material.
Geometrija kompleksov je različna.
Klorid destabilizira začetni material.
Thermodynamic difference and effects are minimal. The increasing bulk of the ligand favours the dissociation of Cl- and such processes are typical of substitutions at octahedral metal centres.
Thermodynamic difference and effects are minimal. The increasing bulk of the ligand favours the dissociation of Cl- and such processes are typical of substitutions at octahedral metal centres.
Thermodynamic difference and effects are minimal. The increasing bulk of the ligand favours the dissociation of Cl- and such processes are typical of substitutions at octahedral metal centres.
Thermodynamic difference and effects are minimal. The increasing bulk of the ligand favours the dissociation of Cl- and such processes are typical of substitutions at octahedral metal centres.

item.title: 024 Inor2cuk-Q2 Which of the following statements characterise the complex

material.mattext:
Katera izmed naslednjih trditev velja za kompleks

[Fe(h-C4H4)(CO)3]?
(C4H4 = ciklobutadien)
Je stabilna, 18-elektronska spojina, ki sprošča ciklobutadien pri oksidaciji z Ce(IV).
Zaradi nestabilnosti ciklobutadiena ga ne moremo pripraviti.
Lahko ga pripravimo, vendar je redek primer 20-elektronske Fe spojine.
Lahko ga pridobimo le kot reaktivno kationsko sol.
Zaradi 18-elektronske konfiguracije je nereaktivna v stiku z nukleofili, elektrofili ali oksidanti.
The unstable ring is stabilised by coordination. Oxidation releases cyclobutadiene, which is highly reactive.
The unstable ring is stabilised by coordination. Oxidation releases cyclobutadiene, which is highly reactive.
The unstable ring is stabilised by coordination. Oxidation releases cyclobutadiene, which is highly reactive.
The unstable ring is stabilised by coordination. Oxidation releases cyclobutadiene, which is highly reactive.

item.title: 025 Inor2duk-Q2 Which of the following statements is true ?

material.mattext: Katera od naslednjih trditev je pravilna?
Silikati nastajajo iz osnovnih SiO44- enot, vendar lahko vključujejo 0,1,2,3 ali 4 kisikove atome med enotami.
Različni silikati temeljijo na različnih SiOn enotah.
V silikatih je za enoto SiO4 značilna tetraedrična razporeditev.
Edini stabilni silikati so aluminosilikati, ki vsebujejo tudi aluminij.<SUB> </SUB><SUP> </SUP>
Silikati s planarno razporeditvijo, kot so sljude, imajo trigonalno planarne SiO33- enote.
It is the sharing of oxygen atoms between the SiO4 units which give different silicates the different overall stoichiometries. The individual units are tettrahedral.

item.title: 026 Inor30uk-Q2 The term symbol for the electronic ground state

material.mattext: Simbol za elektronsko osnovno stanje divodika, H2 , je:
1Sg
3Sg
1Dg
3Pu
1Su

Singlet, with no unpaired electrons, symmetrical with respect to the centre of symmetry [g], sigma, no angular momentum about the bond axis (or equivalently, no change in the sign of the wavefunction).

Singlet, with no unpaired electrons, symmetrical with respect to the centre of symmetry [g], sigma, no angular momentum about the bond axis (or equivalently, no change in the sign of the wavefunction).

Singlet, with no unpaired electrons, symmetrical with respect to the centre of symmetry [g], sigma, no angular momentum about the bond axis (or equivalently, no change in the sign of the wavefunction).

Singlet, with no unpaired electrons, symmetrical with respect to the centre of symmetry [g], sigma, no angular momentum about the bond axis (or equivalently, no change in the sign of the wavefunction).

item.title: 027 Inor38uk-Q2 For the molecules [Mo2(OOCMe)4]

material.mattext:
Za molekule

[Mo2(OOCMe)4] , [W2Cl4(PEt3)4] in [Mo2(OBut)6(μ-CO)]

so razporeditve vezi kovina-kovina in oksidacijska stanja:
4,4,2 in II, II, III
3,3,2 in III, III, II
2,2,0 in IV, IV, V
4,4,2 in II, IV, III
0,0,2 in V, V, III
Mo & W have 6 valence electrons; acetate, butoxide and chloride are 1-electron ligands. CO & PEt3 are 2-electron ligands. The bridging CO should be taken to contribute 1 electron to each metal.
Mo & W have 6 valence electrons; acetate, butoxide and chloride are 1-electron ligands. CO & PEt3 are 2-electron ligands. The bridging CO should be taken to contribute 1 electron to each metal.
Mo & W have 6 valence electrons; acetate, butoxide and chloride are 1-electron ligands. CO & PEt3 are 2-electron ligands. The bridging CO should be taken to contribute 1 electron to each metal.
Mo & W have 6 valence electrons; acetate, butoxide and chloride are 1-electron ligands. CO & PEt3 are 2-electron ligands. The bridging CO should be taken to contribute 1 electron to each metal.

item.title: 028 Inor39uk-Q2 Which of the following reaction sequences is correct

material.mattext:
Katere izmed naslednjih reakcijskih sekvenc so pravilne za sintezo

cis-[PtCl2(NH3)2]     [A]?
[Pt(NH3)4]2+ + HCl  →  [PtCl(NH3)3]+  →  (+HCl)  →  [A]
[PtCl4]2- + NH3  →  [PtCl3(NH3)]- 3)  →  [A]
PtCl2 + 2NH3  →  [A]
[Pt(NH3)2]2+ + 2HCl  →  [A]
Pt + 2NH3 + Cl2  →  [A]

The sequence is determined by the Trans effects of the ligands. Cl has a higher trans-effect, and so the ligand trans to Cl is lost each time; in (2) it is one of two mutually trans Cl ligands which is lost. Reaction (1) will therefore give the trans-isomer. The other reactions are not feasible.

The sequence is determined by the Trans effects of the ligands. Cl has a higher trans-effect, and so the ligand trans to Cl is lost each time; in (2) it is one of two mutually trans Cl ligands which is lost. Reaction (1) will therefore give the trans-isomer. The other reactions are not feasible.

The sequence is determined by the Trans effects of the ligands. Cl has a higher trans-effect, and so the ligand trans to Cl is lost each time; in (2) it is one of two mutually trans Cl ligands which is lost. Reaction (1) will therefore give the trans-isomer. The other reactions are not feasible.

The sequence is determined by the Trans effects of the ligands. Cl has a higher trans-effect, and so the ligand trans to Cl is lost each time; in (2) it is one of two mutually trans Cl ligands which is lost. Reaction (1) will therefore give the trans-isomer. The other reactions are not feasible.

item.title: 029 Inor3euk-Q2 Which of the following statements about the metalloenzyme

material.mattext: Katere so pravilne trditve o metaloencimu - ogljikova anhidraza.
Vsebuje Zn2+ koordinirane s tremi histidinskimi preostanki.
Katalizira hidracijo CO2 in obratno reakcijo.
Deluje le na hidrat CO2.
Smer reakcije je odvisna od pH.<SUP> </SUP><SUB> </SUB>
Njegova funkcija je zagotavljanje ravnotežja CO2 z HCO3-.

item.title: 030 Inor3fuk-Q2 N2F4 is a highly reactive gas

material.mattext:
N2F4 je močno reaktiven plin, npr. odvzame vodik iz tiolov. Plin ima elektronsko absorpcijo pri 260 nm, ki je pri konstantni temperaturi obratno proporcionalna s kvadratnim korenom pritiska [µ  1/√P].

Vzrok je:
Spojina disociira v NF2 radikale.
Reagira s stenami kapilar.<SUB> </SUB>
Tvori dimere.<SUB> </SUB>
Tvori polimere.<SUB> </SUB>
Razgradi se na N2 in 2F2.
Pressure brings the radicals closer together and so suppresses the dissociation.
Pressure brings the radicals closer together and so suppresses the dissociation.
